entry.content:
# Week 1: Initial Results
## Power Consumption Analysis
Our initial tests show promising results in power reduction. The graph below shows the comparison between baseline and optimized versions:
![Power consumption comparison](w1.1.png)
## Key Findings
* Base power draw: 2.4W * Optimized power draw: 1.3W * Peak reduction: 45%
## Implementation Details
The optimization primarily came from:
1. Efficient feature extraction 2. Quantized model weights 3. Improved DSP pipeline
## Next Steps
- [ ] Further optimize the feature extraction - [ ] Test on more devices - [ ] Document the power measurement methodology
